title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 105 - Accounting Periods And Methods And Resident Defined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 105 - Accounting Periods And Methods And Resident Defined

State Regulations

Accounting Periods (§ 105.1 to 105.3)

Accounting Methods (§ 105.10 to 105.13)

Resident Defined (§ 105.20 to 105.23)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 105

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 605[b][1], 697

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
